Posts.Content: Radiation seems so different for everyone.  Mine was my throat, and I never had trouble eating.  My oncologist was 50 miles away.  As soon as I left the treatments, I went across the street and got a sub to eat on the way home.  My biggest problem was excessive mucus in my throat.  My surgeon prescribed 2 600MG Mucinex tablets, twice a day, for 4 years now.  If I forget to take them, my throat lets me know.
Posts.Title: how frequent is the radiation treatment

Posts.Content: I had 33 radiation treatments for throat cancer, about 4 years ago.  My oncologist did them every week day with weekends off.  Just missed a few days when they were performing maintenance on the equipment.
Posts.Title: how frequent is the radiation treatment
